column4: Less than, Not greater than or equal to
Not less than, Greater than or equal to
Less than or equal to, Not greater than
Not less than or equal to, Greater than

column1: ttt => specifies the condition being tested
n = 0 => use ttt; n = 0 => use the negation of ttt
1-byte primary opcodes => the tttn field is located in bits 3, 2, 1, and 0 of the opcode byte.
2-byte primary opcodes => the tttn field is located in bits 3, 2, 1, and 0 of the second opcode byte.
